article: It's 12 o'clock. A man goes into a restaurant for  _  . "Hi! Can I  _  you?" a waiter says. "I'd like some French fries, a  _  and a medium Coke," says the man. "  _  else?" asks the waiter. When he gets back to the restaurant, he finds it's  _  . So he has to wait for half an hour there. After  _  the man's words, the waiter smiles and  _  the manager . The manager thinks the man is good, so he says to the man, "Sorry. We  made  a mistake . You are so good, we decide to give the  _  food to you as a reward ."
